# Installing library
``{r}
library(lpSolveAPI)
```
#Setting the work directory

setwd("~/Desktop/SEMESTER 1")

# Creating a linear programming object with 0 constraints and 9 decision variables
```{r}
lpmod<- make.lp(0, 9)
lpmod
```
#create objective function
```{r}
set.objfn(lpmod, c(420, 360, 300, 420, 360, 300, 420, 360, 300))
```
###  maximize profit
```{r}
lp.control(lpmod,sense='max')
```
# Adding the constraints
```{r}
add.constraint(lpmod, c(1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0), "<=", 750)
add.constraint(lpmod, c(0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0), "<=", 900)
add.constraint(lpmod, c(0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0,1, 1, 1), "<=", 450)
add.constraint(lpmod, c(20, 15, 12, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0), "<=", 13000)
add.constraint(lpmod, c(0, 0, 0, 20, 15, 12, 0, 0, 0), "<=", 12000)
add.constraint(lpmod, c(0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 20, 15, 12), "<=", 5000)
add.constraint(lpmod, c(1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0), "<=", 900)
add.constraint(lpmod, c(0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0), "<=", 12000)
add.constraint(lpmod, c(0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1), "<=", 750)
add.constraint(lpmod, c(6, 6, 6, -5, -5, -5, 0, 0, 0), "=", 0)
add.constraint(lpmod, c( 3, 3, 3, 0, 0, 0, -5, -5, -5), "=", 0)
```
```{r}
set.bounds(lpmod, lower = c(0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0), columns = c(1, 2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9))
```
# Identify the variables and constraints
```{r}
RowsNames <- c("CCN1", "CCN2", "CCN3", "SCN1", "SCN2", "SCN3", "S1CN1", "S1CN2", "S1CN3", "%C1", "%C2")
ColumnsNames <- c("Large1", "Medium1", "Small1", "Large2", "Medium2", "Small2", "Large3", "Medium3", "Small3")
dimnames(lpmod) <- list(RowsNames, ColumnsNames)
```

lpmod

```{r}
solve(lpmod)
```

```{r}
get.objective(lpmod)
get.variables(lpmod)
get.constraints(lpmod)
get.sensitivity.rhs(lpmod)
get.sensitivity.obj(lpmod)
```
